item.title: Water Separators – PASSENGER/COMBI/FREIGHTER WITHOUT DRAW-THROUGH SMOKE DETECTION SYSTEM

remarks.para: May be operated with coalescer bag removed.

placard.para: Placard "_____ PACK WATER SEPARATOR COALESCER REMOVED" below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Remove the associated water coalescer bag (AMM 21-51-05/701).
